Double Indemnity: place§Dietrichsens House, object§the bell, object§the doorframe, object§the door, person§Natty, person§Mrs. Dietrichsen, place§the livingroom, person§Walter, object§Walter's hat,

column6: Neff. My name is Walter Neff.
Listen! Mr. Dietrichsen is not in!
How soon do you expect him?
He'll be home, when he gets here. When that's any help to you
What is it, Natty? Who is it?
I'm Mrs. Dietrichsen. Waht is it?
How do you do, Mrs. Dietrichsen.
I'm Walter Neff, Pacific All Risk.
Pacific All Risk insurance company. It's about some renewance for the automobile. I've trid to contact your Husband for the past two weeks but he's never in his office.
Is there anything I can do?
The insurance ran out at the 15th. I'd hate to think of you smash feathered or something while you're not ...
Perhaps I know what you mean, Mr. Neff. I've just been taking a sun-bath.
No pidgins are all I hope. - ah -
Now, about those policies Mrs. Dietrichsen. I hate to take up your time.
That's all right. If you wait, right. With something on I'll be right there.
Natty, show Mr. Neff into the livingroom.
In there. But they keep the liquer locked up!
It's alright, I'm carrying my own keys.
